DMC - class dmc.DMC.
A Diffusion Monte Carlo Simulation.
DMC(int, double, boolean, double, double, long, int, double, double) - Constructor for class dmc.DMC
Constructor.
DMC(int, double, long) - Constructor for class dmc.DMC
This constructor constructs a simulation with a delta function walker initialization about point initialPosition, the seed given, and the number of walkers given, but everything else with default values.
DMC_SHO - class dmc.DMC_SHO.
This class extends the DMC class to provide a potential for the simple harmonic oscillator.
DMC_SHO(int, double, boolean, double, double, long, int, double, double) - Constructor for class dmc.DMC_SHO
Constructor.
DMC_SHO(int, double, long) - Constructor for class dmc.DMC_SHO
This constructor constructs a simulation with a delta function walker initialization about point initialPosition, the seed given, and the number of walkers given, but everything else with default values.

This class extends the Graph class published by the University of Alabama in Huntsville to graph scatterplot data.
DataGraph(int, int) - Constructor for class graphs.DataGraph
Creates a new graph.
Domain - class edu.uah.math.distributions.Domain.
This class defines a partition of an interval into subintervals of equal width.
Domain(double, double, double, int) - Constructor for class edu.uah.math.distributions.Domain
This general constructor creates a new partition of a specified interval [a, b] into subintervals of width w.
Domain() - Constructor for class edu.uah.math.distributions.Domain
This default constructor creates a new domain on (0, 1) with step size 0.1

S

SHO - Variable in class GUI
The string representation of the SHO potential, for use in combo boxes.
SHOEnergyFunction - class SHOEnergyFunction.
This class extends Function to implement the function for the SHO's ground state energy, E_0, which is a constant.
SHOEnergyFunction(Color) - Constructor for class SHOEnergyFunction
Creates the function with the given color.
SHOPhiFunction - class SHOPhiFunction.
This class extends Function to implement the function for the SHO's ground state wavefunction, Phi_0.
SHOPhiFunction(Color) - Constructor for class SHOPhiFunction
Creates the function with the given color.

updateE0EstimateGraphs() - Method in class GUI
This method updates the mode, color, and max points of the visible E0 estimate graphs.
updateHistograms() - Method in class GUI
This method updates all of the visible histograms, including changing the number of bins, xMin, xMax, the color, whether or not to normalize, the mode, as well as whether or not to graph SHO's Phi_0 function.

This method updates all of the visible phi0Estimate graphs.
updateRefEnergyGraphs() - Method in class GUI
This method updates the mode, color, max points, as well as whether or not to graph SHO's E_0 function on all of the visible reference energy graphs.

V

V(double) - Method in class dmc.DMC
This is the potential energy function, and is meant to be overwritten by a derived class.
V(double) - Method in class dmc.DMC_SHO
This is the potential energy function of the simple harmonic oscillator, V = 1/2 x^2 in dimensionless units.
VERTICAL - Static variable in class edu.uah.math.devices.Graph
 
VariateGenerator - class rvg.VariateGenerator.
This Java package is a port of the RVGS library written in C by Steve Park and Dave Geyer for an introductory simulation class at William and Mary.

Public constructor.
